text: Hagi mofavrenimoka, Solomoniga, negafa Anumzana kenka antahinka nehunka, maka kagu'areti'ene antahintahi ka'areti'ene hunka eri'zama'a erinto. Na'ankure Agra maka vahe'mofo antahi'zana refko huno negeno, agu'afima antahia antahintahia antahino keno nehie. Kagrama kagu'aretima hunka hakenka kesunka, Agrira kenka eri fore hugahane. Hianagi kagrama kamefima humisankeno'a, Agra kamefi hugamigahie.
